truths: Move the pink triangle block B1 to the top left corner.
Move to top left with block B1
Push triangle B1 all the way into the to left corner
Move block B1 to the top-left corner of the arena.
cot:
The ground truth goals all describe an action where block B1, which is a pink triangle, is moved to the top left corner of the arena. The predicted goal, however, states to "Maintain current position with B1," which implies that block B1 should not be moved from its starting position.

Since the predicted goal is directing the agent to do the opposite of what the ground truth goals are stating (to move B1 versus to not move B1), the predicted goal is incorrect. The agent following the predicted goal would fail to achieve the real goal as described in the ground truth.

The similarity level is (1) Incorrect.
